scripts/run_ldmx_app.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import argparse
00004 import os
00005 import getpass
00006 import subprocess
00007 from string import Template
00008 
00009 def main():
00010 
00011     parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Run an ldmx-sim job")
00012     parser.add_argument('-o', nargs=1, help="output ROOT file", required=True)
00013     parser.add_argument('-i', nargs=1, help="input ROOT file", required=True) 
00014     parser.add_argument('-t', nargs=1, help="python template file", required=True)
00015     parser.add_argument('-d', nargs=1, help="output directory", required=True)
00016     args = parser.parse_args()
00017 
00018     if not os.environ.get('LDMXSW_DIR'):
00019         raise Exception("ERROR: LDMXSW_DIR is not set in the environment!")
00020     ldmxsw = os.environ.get('LDMXSW_DIR')
00021 
00022     output_file = args.o[0]
00023     input_file = args.i[0]
00024     tmpl_file = os.path.abspath(args.t[0])
00025     output_dir = os.path.abspath(args.d[0])
00026 
00027     if os.path.exists(output_file):
00028         raise Exception("ERROR: The output file %s already exists!" % output_file)
00029 
00030     # create and cd to local tmp dir
00031     tmp_dir = mk_tmpdir()
00032     os.chdir(tmp_dir)
00033 
00034     # HACK: Symlink data items from data/config e.g. for running the ecal veto BDT.
00035     config_dir = ldmxsw + '/data/config'
00036     for item in os.listdir(config_dir):
00037         src = config_dir+'/'+item
00038         targ = tmp_dir+'/'+item
00039         os.symlink(src, targ)
00040 
00041     # substitute input and output files into the config template
00042     val_dict = {'input_file':input_file, 'output_file':output_file}
00043     config_file = create_config_file(tmpl_file, val_dict)
00044 
00045     subprocess.Popen('echo -n \"started: \"; date', shell=True).wait()
00046 
00047     command = 'time ldmx-app %s' % config_file
00048     subprocess.Popen(command, shell=True).wait()
00049 
00050     os.system('cp -r %s/%s %s' % (tmp_dir, output_file, output_dir))
00051     os.system('ls -lah %s' % os.path.join(output_dir, output_file))
00052     subprocess.Popen('echo -n \"ended: \"; date', shell=True).wait()
00053     subprocess.Popen('rm -rf %s' % tmp_dir, shell=True).wait()
00054 
00055 def mk_tmpdir():
00056     scratch_dir = '/scratch/'+getpass.getuser()
00057     if not os.path.exists(scratch_dir):
00058         os.makedirs(scratch_dir)
00059     tmp_dir = '%s/%s' % (scratch_dir, os.environ['LSB_JOBID'])
00060     if not os.path.exists(tmp_dir):
00061         os.makedirs(tmp_dir)
00062     return tmp_dir
00063 
00064 def create_config_file(tmpl_file, val_dict):
00065 
00066     tf = open(tmpl_file)
00067     src = Template(tf.read())
00068     res = src.substitute(val_dict)
00069     print "Created config from template '%s'" % tmpl_file
00070     print
00071     print res
00072     print
00073     of = open(os.path.basename(tmpl_file.replace('.tmpl', '')), 'w')
00074     of.write(res)
00075     of.close()
00076     return of.name
00077 
00078 if __name__ == '__main__' :
00079     main()
